supercalifragilisticexpialidocious.英释: if you win something handily, you win easily

pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovocanoconi.中释: 超微粒硅酸盐尘埃沉着症，火山矽肺病（一种因吸入细小的硅酸盐或石英粉尘而引起的慢性肺部疾病）
pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovocanoconi.英释: a chronic lung disease caused by the inhalation of fine silicate or quartz dust

antidisestablishmentarianism.中释: 反对教会与国家分开学说
